abstract: Brazil's anticorruption minister Fabiano Silveira is latest official to resign after recording implicating him in obstructing Petrobras corruption investigation surfaces; secret recordings are increasingly ubiquitous weapon for paranoid politicians hoping to survive country's toxic political situation.

headline.print_headline: Recording Spurs Brazil’s Anticorruption Minister to Resign
headline.main: Recording Spurs Anticorruption Minister to Resign in Brazil

snippet: A secretly recorded conversation seemed to show that he tried to stymie the graft investigation involving the national oil company.
lead_paragraph: A secretly recorded conversation seemed to show that he tried to stymie the graft investigation involving the national oil company.
